name: Shoot em UP (OnzyBoy)
description:
This game is a survival maze game where the number of enemies(red capsules) that appear depends on the wave number. Your objective is to survive as many waves as possible. It takes 3 bullets to eliminate an enemy!

You lose health when an enemy touches you!

Controls:

Key/Button actionKeyboard & MouseControllerMovement
Jump
Sprint (toggle)
Shoot
AimWASD
Space
Left Shift
Left Mouse Button
Right Mouse ButtonLeft Stick
A
Left Stick Press
Right Trigger
Left Trigger

Note: The game has some issues such as the enemy may not follow you. For those who'll use a controller the sensitivity is low.
